sentences.sContent: You can contact us by e-mail.
sentences.sCn: 你可以通过电子邮件跟我们联系。

sentences.sContent: Do you want to send an E-mail?
sentences.sCn: 你想发一封电子邮件吗？

sentences.sContent: Jamie e-mailed me to say he couldn't come.
sentences.sCn: 杰米给我发了一封电子邮件说他不能来了。

remMethod.val: “伊妹儿”→给漂亮妹妹发电子邮件→电子邮件

trans.tranOther: E-mail is a system of sending written messages electronically from one computer to another. E-mail is an abbreviation of .
If you e-mail someone, you send them an e-mail
